==== bug24703.js (7 errors) ====
    var Common = {};
    Common.I = class {
           ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'I' does not exist on type '{}'.
        constructor() {
            this.i = 1
                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'i' does not exist on type 'I'.
        }
    }
    Common.O = class extends Common.I {
           ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'O' does not exist on type '{}'.
                                    ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'I' does not exist on type '{}'.
        constructor() {
            super()
            this.o = 2
                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'o' does not exist on type 'O'.

    var o = new Common.O()
                       ~

    var i = new Common.I()
                       ~
